formalpara.title: Figure 4. Hox genes and VPC competence group
formalpara.para: lin-39 is expressed in the central body region, including P3.p- P8.p shown. mab-5 is expressed in more posterior cells including P7.p and P8.p. Arrow, positive regulation of competence; bar, negative regulation of competence. Yellow, 3° fate; red, 2° fate; blue, 1° fate.
